title: Hailey Bieber Wore the Tiniest White Dress to Her Rehearsal Dinner
text:
From Harper's BAZAAR

Hailey and Justin Bieber were seen arriving to their wedding venue in South Carolina last night ahead of their religious ceremony.

Hailey wore an off-the-shoulder, mini wrap dress with heeled sandals accented with bows for the celebration.

Justin was also seen, erm, dancing on his wife on a boat as they entered.

The wedding festivities are underway for Hailey and Justin Bieber, who are reportedly having their religious nuptial ceremony today, more than a year after they legally married at a New York City courthouse. To kick off the celebrations, the couple reportedly hosted a rehearsal dinner at their venue, the Montage Palmetto Bluff in South Carolina, last night.

The Biebers were seen arriving via boat to the riverside hotel, according to photos published by the Daily Mail. Justin opted for a white polo shirt, black slacks, and boat shoes. Hailey, on the other hand, dressed up in a white mini wrap dress with a romantic off-the-shoulder neckline.

Bows were a common theme in her accessories: She wore one in her hair and one on the back of each of her white sandal heels. For jewelry, she opted for what looks like a diamond pendant necklace and stud earrings. The bride-to-be had a drink in hand, showing she was ready for the wedding celebrations to begin.

The couple also showed off their mischievous sides during the ride in. Videos captured by onlookers show the pair en route in their boat, with Justin, um, let's just say "dancing" on Hailey.

You really can't unsee it.
